Throws:
Exception

noExpansion

public void noExpansion()
                 throws IOException
This test indexes a sample metadata record (=lucene document) having a "title", "description", and "subject" field, which contains plain subject terms. A search for "arms" doesn't return that record because the term "arms" is not explicitly contained in the record (document).

Throws:
IOException
org.apache.lucene.store.LockObtainFailedException
org.apache.lucene.index.CorruptIndexException
